name: Word Slinger
description:
Search and find all hidden words in the grid. Increase your vocabulary and exercise your brain!

In this game there are so many different categories like animal, tools, country, cars, music, sports, space, city and many more.

The words can be placed horizontally, vertically and later in the game diagonally. Drag to select a word. You have 3 hints for every game.

So download the app lets start fun in finding the words.
